scripts.verify:ci: bun run verify:ci:checks && bun run test
scripts.verify:ci:checks: bun run typecheck && bun run check && bun run check-publish-guardrails && bun run check-changeset && bun run check-bunup-registry && bun run check-preset-dependency-versions && bun run docs:check:ci && bun run docs:check:links && bun run check-exports && bun run check-readme-imports && bun run build && bun run check-clean-tree && bun run check-boundary-invocations && bun run check-canonical-surface-map && bun run check-surface-map-format && bun run schema:diff
scripts.check-canonical-surface-map: if git ls-files --error-unmatch 'apps/outfitter/.outfitter/surface.json' >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "apps/outfitter/.outfitter/surface.json must not be tracked. Canonical surface map is .outfitter/surface.json." && exit 1; fi
scripts.build:local: bunup && bun scripts/normalize-exports.ts && cd apps/outfitter && bun link
scripts.docs:sync:readme: bun run --filter @outfitter/docs build && bun run packages/docs/dist/cli.js docs sync-readme --cwd .
scripts.docs:sync: bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts sync docs --cwd . && bun run docs:sync:readme
scripts.docs:sync:release:llms: bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms && bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms-full
scripts.docs:check:release:llms: bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms && bun run apps/outfitter/src/commands/repo.ts export docs --cwd . --target llms-full && git diff --exit-code -- docs/llms.txt docs/llms-full.txt && test -z "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard -- docs/llms.txt docs/llms-full.txt)"
scripts.release: turbo run build --no-daemon && bun run scripts/changeset-publish.ts
scripts.release:canary: npx changeset version --snapshot canary && turbo run build --no-daemon && bun run scripts/changeset-publish.ts --tag canary
